rajaliya meheyume di mejar pranandu mahatha dakwu wirathwaya ekala siyalu madhyawala katha bahata lak wu agaya kalayuthu awasthawaki.yapanaya kotuwen pitatha sita koti ella kala dadi prahara gana nothaka siya jiwithaya paraduwata thaba guwan hamuda helikotaptarayen kotuwa thulata bassa mejar pranandu ehi sirawi siti siyalu niladharin bera ganimata samath wiya.ema meheyumen jayagath mejar pranandu alimankada satane di dak wu dakshatha ohuta parama wibhu®shana sammanaya puda kirimata nirdesha kirime di salakillata gena thibe.parama wibhushana sammanaya sandaha siya nama yojana wima pilibandawa mejar pranandu mahatha dadi sathuten kal gatha kalada eya kisidaka ohuta laba nodimata sarath fonseka mahatha katayuthu kele ya.wiwidha hethun matha sammana pirinamima kal giya athara jenaral kobbakaduwa mahatha ghathanaya wimath samanga sammanaya labima sihinayak wiya.thama swamipurushayata himi sammanaya laba nodima gana wasanthi pranandu mahathmiya jenaral fonseka mahathage biriya wana anoma fonseka mahathmiya wetha gos karunu kiwada eya da palak nowiya.awasanaye nirdesha wu sammanayada ahimiwa wishra්rama watupada nomathiwa jayantha pranandu mahathata hamuda sewayen samu ganimata ida salasune me niladharinge kriya kalapaya nisaya.ada hamuda wiruwan ge duka sapa gana katha karana hamudawen sahaya apeksha karana fonseka yuwala eda rata muda ganime di uradun ranawiruwata kala de nithara sihipath karayi.
